content.body: Do we have a table somewhere to track which proposals are at which stage? I can't find anything in the repo. The proposal docs themselves also don't contain which stage they are at.
We don’t. This is something we haven’t been great about. I need to do some work on my slides today, I can add a table to our readme and maybe label the specific proposal docs as well
